attributes.action: Withdraw the UK from the ECHR.
attributes.additional_details:
To stop innocent lives being lost at sea.
To stop criminal gangs profiting from vulnerable people.
To protect British citizens from criminals posing as migrants.
To protect genuine asylum seekers.
To secure UK boarders.
attributes.background: Withdraw the UK from the ECHR

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618456
